description:
The new series will have three generations of father, child, and descendant as the lead characters. The main characters pilot the Gundam unit to fight against an http://anidb.net/ch37774 [unknown attacking enemy (UE)] and save Earth in a One Hundred Year War - an apparent homage to the One Year War of the http://anidb.net/a715 [first Gundam series].
The first main character is http://anidb.net/ch33333 [Flit Asuno], who developed the http://anidb.net/ch37776 [Gundam AGE-1] mobile suit (humanoid mobile weapon) equipped with the AGE System (a self-adapting computer). The second main character is http://anidb.net/ch33334 [Asemu Asuno], Flit`s child. The third main character is http://anidb.net/ch33335 [Kio Asuno], Flit`s descendant who inherits the Gundam. The Gundam AGE-1 can be augmented as the http://anidb.net/ch37777 [Gundam AGE-1 Titus] for more power, or as the http://anidb.net/ch37778 [Gundam AGE-1 Spallow] for more speed.
Other characters include http://anidb.net/ch33336 [Emily], Flit`s friend since he was 7. http://anidb.net/ch33337 [Grodek] is a Commander in the http://anidb.net/ch38468 [Earth Federation Forces] and the captain of the battleship http://anidb.net/ch35738 [Diva]. http://anidb.net/ch33338 [Millais] is a Lieutenant (junior grade) in the Federation Forces aboard the Diva.
Source: ANN

titles.title: ファーデーンの光と影
Do or Die on the Common Front
その涙, 宇宙に落ちて
Yuujou to Koi to Mobile Suits
友情と恋とモビルスーツ
ビッグリング絶対防衛線
地球 それはエデン
The Red Evening Sun is Seen
じいちゃんのガンダム
Terror! The Ghosts of the Desert
宇宙海賊ビシディアン
The Door to the New World
Kio no Ketsui: Gundam to Tomo ni
Kio`s Resolve, Together with the Gundam
キオの決意 ガンダムと共に
ジラード・スプリガン
壮絶 トリプルガンダム
宇宙要塞ラ・グラミス
青い星 散りゆく命
